title: Evaluating and implementing temporal, spatial, and spatio-temporal ...
summary: This paper evaluates and implements various temporal, spatial, and spatio-temporal methods using a training dataset of real NYC syndromic data. It focuses on daily syndromic surveillance and the practical decisions for model implementation.
usefulness_reason: This article is highly relevant as it directly discusses 'temporal, spatial, and spatio-temporal methods' and their application to a 'training dataset', aligning well with the 'Spatio Temporal' and 'Contextual dataset' aspects of the query.
